content.rendered:
Directed by H. Vinoth

Written by H. Vinoth

Cast Ajith Kumar (Bharath Subramaniam). Shraddha Srinath (Meera Krishnan). Abhirami Venkatachalam (Famitha Banu). Andrea Tariang(Andrea Tariang). Arjun Chidambaram (Adhik). Adhik Ravichandran (Vishwa). Aswin Rao (Venkatesh). Rangaraj Pandey (Sathyamoorthy). Sujith Shanker (Gavaskar (as Sujith Shankar)). V. Jayaprakash (Jameen Ramajayam). Junior Balaiya (Junior). Delhi Ganesh (Krishnan). Vidya Balan (Kalyani) . Krishnakumar Menon (Corporate official).Apurba Panda. Dinesh Prabhakar (Police Officer (as Dinesh Nair))

Languages Tamil

Producers Boney Kapoor

Production Bayview Project
